item.title: Learning Blender
item.description: Learning Blender Old monkey need new tricks and will note and share for future self reference. Tips Down below there is a small bar the will help remember shortcuts Left bar is usually dependent on which mode is selected and has the tools for it Top left is mode menu Top right is gizmos menu (zoom and etc) and above it a view mode menu (x-ray, gizmos hiding, etc) In Ubuntu, Context Menu is Right Click Modifiers Subdivision Surface - creates more divisions automatically.
